Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-52429 affecting package kernel for versions less than 5.15.153.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-52429 affecting package kernel for versions less than 5.15.153.1-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package kernel is earlier than 5.15.153.1-1, affected by CVE-2023-52429
